titleStmt.title: Mr. Speakers letter to the Kings most excellent Majestie, Febr. 16, 1641 concerning the great affayres, and state of the kingdome.
titleStmt.author: Lenthall, William, 1591-1662.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Lenthall by Wing and Nuc pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
